price: “Eğer doğru söyleyenlerden isen bize melekleri getirsene!”
arabic: لَّوۡمَا تَأۡتِينَا بِٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: law mā tatīnā bil-malāikati in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
